verses.verse: The men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were gathered together, <S%H6817><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> northward; <S%H6828><s%> and they said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Why did you pass over <S%H5674><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and didn't <S%H7121><s%> call us to go <S%H3212><s%> with you? <S%H8313><s%> We will burn your house <S%H1004><s%> around you with fire! <S%H784><s%>"

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H5971><s%> "I and my people were <S%H1961><s%> at great <S%H3966><s%> strife <S%H376><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%> and when I called <S%H2199><s%> you, <S%H3467><s%> you didn't save me out of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

When I saw <S%H7200><s%> that you didn't <S%H3467><s%> save me, <S%H7760><s%> I put my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hand, <S%H3709><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand. <S%H3027><s%> Why then have you come up <S%H5927><s%> to me this day, <S%H3117><s%> to fight against me? <S%H3898><s%>"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> gathered together <S%H6908><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> because they said, <S%H559><s%> "You are fugitives <S%H6412><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> you Gileadites, <S%H1568><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"

The Gileadites <S%H1568><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> the fords <S%H4569><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> against the Ephraimites. <S%H669><s%> It was so, <S%H6412><s%> that when the fugitives of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let me go over, <S%H5674><s%>" the men <S%H582><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H673><s%> "Are you an Ephraimite?" If he said, <S%H559><s%> "No;"

then they said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> "Now say <S%H7641><s%> 'Shibboleth;'" and he said <S%H559><s%> "Sibboleth; <S%H5451><s%>" for he couldn't <S%H3559><s%> manage to pronounce <S%H1696><s%> it right: <S%H3559><s%> then they siezed <S%H270><s%> him, <S%H7819><s%> and killed him at the fords <S%H4569><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> At that time, <S%H6256><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> fell. <S%H5307><s%>

Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
After <S%H310><s%> him Ibzan <S%H78><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He had thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> he brought <S%H935><s%> in from abroad <S%H2351><s%> for his sons. <S%H1121><s%> He judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Ibzan <S%H78><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> at Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulunite <S%H2075><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulunite <S%H2075><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Aijalon <S%H357><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
After <S%H310><s%> him Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He had forty <S%H705><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>' sons, who rode <S%H7392><s%> on seventy <S%H7657><s%> donkey colts: <S%H5895><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Pirathon <S%H6552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of the Amalekites. <S%H6003><s%>
